rules_text:
Hexproof
Whenever a creature with power 6 or greater attacks, you may transform Hero Incognito.
rules_text2:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Hero Revealed, create blue Equipment artifact tokens named Blades and Costume attached to it, with “Equipped creature gets 3/+0” and “Equipped creature gets +0/+3” respectively. Both have equip {2}.
